page.title: 17Where people work.
page.content: I have asked some school children where their parents work. Here are the results: Haverhill 12, Cambridge 7, Not fixed place of work 6, Castle Camps 6, Horseheath 4, London 3, Chelmsford 3, World 2, Abington 2, Home 2, Linton 2, Harlow 1, Manchester 1. We can now see that most people go to Haverhill. Here are the results of what people do at work_ Shops 6, Farm workers 5, Plasterers 4,Tooth brush makers 3, Doctors 2, Dinner ladies 2, Out of work 1 Most people go to work at shops.There are also several Farm workers. METHODS OF TRANSPORT USED _ to or at work. Car 33, van 6, Walk 6,Train 3, Truck 2, bike 1. Most people get to work by car and least get to work by bike. by Simon.
